summary: After her village is destroyed and all its residents slaughtered by the evil wizard Gardein and his master The Dark Lord, a warrior known as Lemnear, The Silver Champion, vows to find and kill them both to avenge the massacre.
cast: Jezabel Montero|Harvey Shain|Greg Baglia|Bart Shattuck|Bill Rogers|Veronica Taylor|Wendy Scharfman|Tesshô Genda|Unshô Ishizuka|Iemasa Kayumi|Ryûsei Nakao|Chikao Ohtsuka|Ryûji Saikachi|Nozomu Sasaki|Nobuo Tobita|Toshiya Ueda|Eiko Yamada|Keiko Yokozawa|Rihoko Yoshida|Hôchû Ôtsuka
title: Legend of Lemnear: Kyokuguro no tsubasa barukisasu
